content.heading: **Engineering Technician I**
details: *Feb. 2020 - Sep. 2021* - Under minimal supervision, performed routine sterilizer maintenance including: electro-mechanical trouble-shooting, component/sub-assembly rebuild or refurbishment, preventative maintenance and complete sterilizer overhaul. Additionally, designed and performed unique experiments as requested, evaluating and confirming test data accuracy and generating formal verbal and/or written reports. Also wrote scripts aiding in data collection and analysis and learned web app development to implement a new website for the company.
